body.name: EUKI Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Chime, Voice Changer, Voice Message, PIR Motion Detection, Instant Alerts, Battery Powered, Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance, 2.4G WiFi, IP66.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 41 mins
features: Two-way Audio & Voice changer: 2-way audio intercom allows you to see and speak to couriers anywhere and anytime. Select a pre-recorded voice message to help you reply quickly. With the upgraded feature of changing voice tone, EUKI J9 wireless doorbell can disguise actual gender and age to better protect privacy. Perfect for the elderly, children, and females living alone.

Wire-Free & Wireless Indoor Chime: This wireless doorbell camera takes less than 5 minutes to install and set up before use. No need for specialized wiring personnel. You can set it up in 5 minutes with a screwdriver and a power drill. If you don't want to drill holes at apartment, there is strong 3M double-side adhesives as an alternative. The included wireless chime is easy to be set in any room. It will remind you of the visitors when your phone is not by your side.

Stable Connection & Battery Powered: With built-in battery and low power consumption, keep 90 days of battery life per charge. Video doorbell works great with *2.4Ghz WiFi. Sync and running in minutes on Cloudot app.

Smart Human Detection & Motion Zones Customization: With motion detection enabled, once human activity detected and notifies you in seconds. Five levels of adjustable sensitivity and motion zone settings avoid receiving frequent and unnecessary notifications.

Local/Cloud Storage & Responsive Support: Secure your home privacy via 1080P HD video quality, 145° wider viewing angle, and infrared night vision. No monthly fees if you record video by local SD card up to 128 G (*SD card not included). Our security doorbell camera keeps your information from leaks through advanced encryption. And we will offer you professional service!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 87 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: J9 Video Doorbell Camera Wireless with Chime The EUKI J9 WiFi Doorbell Camera support 2.4GHz WiFi (5GHz WiFi is not supported). You can take less than 2 minutes to set up without having to use any complicated tools. Downloading CloudEdge App on Google Play/App Store can help you use it quickly. It’s compatible with iOS and Android.

The J9 wireless video doorbell camera is adopted an all-glass lens with HDR and distortion correction, which present you1080P FHD live video or playback video. Equipped with IR sensor and LED, day or night, rain or shine, the camera can automatically switch the light to ensure you a crystal view.

Camera doorbell built-in microphone and speaker providing you with real-time clear two-way audio, you can see, hear and talk with the visitors immediately, or select a pre-recorded voice message for quick replies.

With the Doorbell Camera WiFi with Motion Detector Home Security Doorbell helps you maintain safety by viewing whoever is at your door without opening it. Besides, it's the extra set of eyes and ears needed to protect your home.

The Camera Doorbell supports multiple device connections. You can share the monitor with others by scanning their CloudEdge QR code. It can support unlimited users. Allow all your family members to monitor the security of your home.

What APP does the doorbell camera support? The doorbell camera only support"CloudEdge" APP. What network mode is the video doorbell compatible with? The video doorbell only support 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi , not work with 5Ghz Wi-Fi. Does the wireless video doorbell camera with indoor chime? Yes, the wireless video doorbell included the indoor chime. What‘s the operating conditions? You can use the doorbell camera in -5°F to 120°F (-20°C to 48°C). Does the camera doorbell can be supported view in real time/live view? Yes, open the app and click on the live button, will allow you view any time in real time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These cameras are great!
reviews.reviewText: Man, I love these cameras! I bought 4 of them and I put one on each side of my house. They were so easy to install. It took my husband no time at all to hang them. Setting up the actual camera itself is also super easy. The picture is crystal clear both night and day and the sound is just awesome. I can stand in my driveway and my camera that is mounted at the other end of the house can hear me clearly. It's got awesome sound when you speak to people outside too. I've used them to talk to my husband as well as to call my cats. As a default, they do not record cars passing by or animals that may be walking around your property. However, I do get the occasional notices of each, which I don't mind. I put 128 gb micro SD cards in all of mine. The only thing I would say is make sure to fully charge them, with the USB cord provided, before installing them outside. We installed them on a cloudy winter day, which turned out to be overcast for awhile, after not being charged fully, and we had to take a couple of them down and charge them manually. Since then, we haven't had any problems. I would highly recommend. :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: it’s easy for installation and top operational features.1. “good line of sight“ to your WiFi network for the best reception, and a spot for the solar panel to be in the sun. First of all, this comes with a thick metal mounting cradle with 4 screws to mount it to any wood surface. Follow the instructions in the booklet and install the App to operate the camera. Once you have connected to your camera, you will have allot you can do. Here is a list of the features that you can control through your camera: 1 Turn your speaker volume on and off, 2 check your history stored on your SD card, 3 Screenshot for Live Stream, 4 and this is great Turn on or Off or Adjust the Motion Detection, 5 Adjust the Pan and Tilt of the Lens,6 Start/Stop recording, 7 Speak or Listen to any conversations, 8 Store Screenshots and Videos and other things dependent on the storage ;you choseAs you can see from the photos, these cameras have great detail and are versatile for taking pictures and can do the same for videos. I’ve tried many and for my money, these are the best for my money. While I was away in Mexico, they worked pretty darn good despite the terrible WiFi connection’s in that area. Performance was better than I thought they would despite the spotty WiFi signals.The solar works well thus far and I like the ease of hooking up power locally by using the solar recharging but you may need extensions to make it work. Did I mention, the battery is great. No power cord needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They charge you to download an app to use it - Crappy product!
reviews.reviewText: It was too late by the time I got ready to set it up to get a refund! Not only do they charge you a fee to use the app. It costs more than the crappy product. Not truly waterproof, and I didn't use it but could tell by looking at it. The app is not a trustworthy company. Check to see why the US government stopped using this company and the app!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our old doorbell was broken, and we decided to upgrade it to one with a camera. Wow it's really nice, works great as a doorbell and a security camera. We wish we had got it earlier!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adequate Camera. Solar power is Great
reviews.reviewText: Very easy install! Camera is compact and looks great. And the solar power is really handy and allows for applications just about anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really fncking impressive
reviews.reviewText: nice looking and seems of good quality. Tested for a few days in our backyard. The solar panel is small but more than enough to charge the battery - well it's summer now and we do have sufficient sunlight here. Let's see if it's still the case in winter (I guess you might need to adjust the angle). Infrared mode at night which is probably sufficient. It comes with flood lights and I was hoping it could turn on the lights once it detects motion (my other camera does this) but I haven't figured out how to set this up.-----Okay after having this thing running in the backyard for bout a year I'm back to update my review: it's fncking impressive. With that small solar panel and whatever battery it got, it runs perfectly fine even in winter(we usually get a fnckton of snow here). No issues whatsoever. Would give 10 stars if I could!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My home security is complete! No subscriptions, all saved on SD out of the cloud.
reviews.reviewText: First, this is my 4th camera from this company. That should speak for itself on how I feel about their cameras. I live on a busy intersection where cars zoom by constantly. Safety from speeding cars and trespassers is always on my mind so any reassurances I can get helps me sleep at night. I have a stalker and this has saved me on numerous occasions. The police have also given me trouble due to false allegations from said stalker and this gives me reassurance that all conversations and interactions are audio and video recorded!Pros:These cameras all operate on the same app which makes them easy to access with a user friendly app.SD memory back up (with cloud options) let’s me pull what I need when I need it. My biggest gripe with competing brands are that they require subscriptions and/or only utilize cloud storage. I don’t want to be connected to any service as I only want the ability to record and be notified when someone steps onto my property. All the other services are just bells and whistles.The ability to talk through the camera and have a spot light to scare off unwanted guests are a cool plus.Insulation was pretty straight forward.Cons:Small gripe but I wish it were a continuous recording instead of just motion detected events. I can of course record if needed by accessing the app. Make me worry if something were to not trigger the sensor I wouldn’t be able to pull back the footage.EDIT:ignore what I say below, I discovered there is a feature to paint the areas you wish to detect motion!!! This was my primary issue and this was clearly thought of when programming. Amazing.The motion detection is imposible to rely on if your using to protect an area by a street. Can’t blame the camera as it does warn you of this when installing but the ability to “zone” where to track motion would be amazing and would make this camera above and beyond expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find answers to questions about the operation
reviews.reviewText: Email support is all that is available for this product. Took me a while to figure it out. Supports Micro Sd Card but also can purchase their cloud access for a price. I also had to get a specific Micro card up to 128 GB and a rating of 10 Ultra.

Nachdem ich die Kamera erhalten habe wurde dieser direkt eingebaut und installiert.Nutze es seit knapp 10 Tagen und habe bis jetzt keine Probleme.Installation war einfach. Bildqualität bin ich ehrlich gesagt positiv überrascht und kann es definitivweiter empfehlen. Die schwarze Farbe erleichtert das verstecken der Kamera. Zum Testzwecken habe ich es im Regal versteckt... Mal sehen ob ihr es finden könnt XD

reviews.reviewTitle: Gute Kamera für Tag und Nachts
reviews.reviewText: Geile Kamera. schön Stabil, klein und unauffällig. nutze sie fürs Streaming , aber auch zur Sicherheit. wer sich mit Technik auskennt, bekommt das Easy hin. Die Nachtsicht ist klar und deutlich, ebenso die Bewegungsalamierung aufs Handy. Der klang ist nicht der allerbeste, aber für den Preis unschlagbar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Teilweise nur Silhouetten, keine gute Night Vision
reviews.reviewText: 🔹 Test: 🔹Steuerung:Die Kamera ist schnell und unkompliziert anzubringen und zu steuern. Mit der APP kannst du die Aufzeichnungen Live sehen. Dafür muss man jedoch die App "CloudEdge" installieren. Diese gibt es nur für Android und iOS, Apple Nutzer müssen sich hierfür ein Benutzerkonto anlegen. ⭐⭐⭐Größe:Die Minikamera ist doch etwas größer als erwartet. Für zuhause ist sie ok, jedoch nicht als eine versteckte Überwachung gedacht. ⭐⭐Bild:Die Qualität ist einstellbar und für den Preis sehr gut. Für reine Überwachung ok, aber nichts mit Qualität bei Nacht. In der Beschreibung wurde es zwar ausgeschrieben, aber enttäuschenderweise bekommt man bei Dunkelheit nur ein schwarzes Bild. Lediglich die Geräusche werden aufgezeichnet. Bei gedämpftem Licht erkennt man lediglich Silhouetten. Die Bewegungen werden allerdings perfekt angezeigt. Also kein nachziehen oder versetzter Ton. ⭐⭐⭐Ton:Klar zu hören, auch wenn keine Geräuschunterdrückung dabei ist. Das kann man bei dem Preis allerdings auch nicht erwarten. Von daher top.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Bewegungsmelder:Die Funktion mit dem Bewegungssensor klappt ziemlich gut. Allerdings erkennt er auch Veränderungen in der Umgebung. Bei mir hat er beispielsweise angezeigt, als die Sonne durch die Jalousie herein gestrahlt hat. Ab Start der Bewegung werden 5 Minuten aufgezeichnet. Dabei lässt sich auch die Empfinglichkeit der Bewegungserkennung einstellen, daher ToP ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Das Fazit: ⭐Alles in allem eine ganz gute Kamera (Preis-Leistung), wenn man mal eben irgendeine Kleinigkeit überwachen möchte. Zum Beispiel einen bestimmten Raum während des Urlaubs oder dergleichen. Somit vergebe ich hier nur 4⭐⭐⭐⭐.

Ich finde die Kmera super! Sie ist relativ klein, wodurch man sie überall hinstellen kann. Geliefert wird auch direkt Ausrüstung, um sie zu montieren (also Schrauben). Die Einrichtung ist auch ziemlich einfach. Die datu gehörige App lässt sich auch easy steuern. Ich bin echt überzeugt bon dem ding!

Habe mir die Kamera zugelegt, damit ich auch wenn ich mal nicht Zuhause bin, sehen kann was dort vor sich geht.Zur Installation, die Kamera wird mit Dübel und Schrauben geliefert. Die Installation an der Wand gestaltete sich sehr leicht.Mit der zugehörigen App ist auch die Ersteinrichtung kein Problem, alles wird schritt für Schritt erklärt. Wichtig ist, dass der Router auf 2,4ghz sendet und nicht 5ghz.Der Bewegungsmeldern funktioniert top und die Bilder sind gut aufgelöst, man erkennt alles. Für meine Zwecke absolut in Ordnung.
